Input: I would like to save my favorite restaurants for quick future reuse
I frequently use the same restaurants to order from and looking them up each time consumes alot of time
I would like to have the option to pay an additional fee for priority delivery
Waiting on an order might take up time i don't have
I would like to have the option to search for specific dishes, currently it is only possible to search for restaurants
Scanning each restaurant takes up alot of time
A form in which i can register my allergies
I need to look at each dish individually which takes unnescessary time
If I try to order an idea which i am allergic to a warning message should pop up
